name: pnp-powershell-extension
description: This extension provides functionalities that may be helpful when creating scripts using PnP PowerShell like docs, commands list, sample gallery and many more.

commands.title: PnP PS: Open docs for command

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm --prefix ./webview-ui/commandsList install ./webview-ui/commandsList && npm --prefix ./webview-ui/docsView install ./webview-ui/docsView && npm --prefix ./webview-ui/samplesView install ./webview-ui/samplesView
scripts.build:webview: npm --prefix ./webview-ui/commandsList run build && npm --prefix ./webview-ui/docsView run build && npm --prefix ./webview-ui/samplesView run build
scripts.vscode:prepublish: npm run clean && npm run build:webview && npm run compile
scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
